scripts.build-message: mkdir -p terraform/build && zip -qr terraform/build/process-message.zip process-message/ node_modules/
scripts.build-all: npm run-script build-message && npm run-script build-conformance && npm run-script build-bulkdata
scripts.deploy: (cd terraform && terraform init && terraform apply <<< yes)
scripts.build-deploy: npm run-script build-all && npm run-script deploy
